attributes.action: DISBAND THE COALITION AND HOLD A GENERAL ELECTION
attributes.additional_details: This Coalition is not working the Conservative part of the Government cant carry out the wishes of the majority of the population, the British people are actually being ruled and dictated too by a Political Party with less than 8% of the vote it is time to stop the tail wagging the dog and if David Cameron does not have the guts to call an General Election let us the PEOPLE force him to, Europe is Dead on its feet it is finished do we the British People get a say on what we want no the Political Elite do not believe we have the right, this my friends is not Democracy it is in fact a DICTATORSHIP, The Franco German Alliance have Conquered the Whole of Europe by Stealth including our Beloved Country Great Britain they have done now what they failed to do in numerous conflicts including two World Wars in which our Great Grandfathers, Grandfathers, Fathers, so on and so forth DIED they sacrificed their lives so we could live free from TYRANNY
